title: Support for Tensor.repeat() operator in onnx
body_html:
🚀 Feature

It seems that Tensor.repeat() is not in the list of operators supported by the ONNX exporter.
It would be great to add it.

Motivation

I use TensorboardX to visualize models' computational graphs. It uses the ONNX exporter and I can't visualize the graphs of models using Tensor.repeat().

Pitch

Alternatives

Additional context
